tbag.location

Class EventLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tbag.location.Location
      • tbag.location.EventLocation

  • public class EventLocation
extends Location
    Location that executes an Event when visited for the first time. Event must be reactivated externally to occur again.
    Author:
    Trevor Skupien

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Event event
      Event executed by onVisit()
